phrases: What a pity to reunite with your old friend, only to have it turn out like this...
But destroying Fairy Tail is nothing more than a step toward our goal.
What we are after is the legendary Black Wizard Zeref.
I await your reports of triumph!
I can sense some disturbing magic...
Meh name is Caprico, one of the 7 Kin of Purgatory.
So there is 7 of you higher-ups?
You did well supporting the guild for these 48 years.
The curtain is falling on Fairy Tail, and you along with it.
Is that all the power you need to hunt dragons?
And my body's finally gotten warmed up.
The real fight starts now, damn it!
He said he was a God Slayer or something...
Are there guys like this all around Earthland?
I forgot to give you my name.
I am one of Grimoire Heart's 7 Kin of Purgatory,
Your reckless rampages are even famous in the Baram Alliance!
It is the most powerful organization of Dark Guilds!
It is led by three guilds: Grimoire Heart, Oracion Seis, and Tartaros.
Natsu-san and the rest of the Allied Guilds destroyed Oracion Seis, but...
I cannot believe that the strongest one in the alliance, Grimoire Heart, would come here...
Destroying Lullaby, getting in the way of Deliora's resurrection,
and even sending the R system and Nirvana to their makers...
You beat those nobodies and think you are such hot stuff?
You widdle dwagon swayer gots a big head!
So, you were taught by a god?
If you were to call Master Hades a god, then it is from a god that I received this Lost Magic!
Sounds like you got it from a human to me.
Well, I was taught by a real dragon!
So it is like, this thing's cousin?
Grandine is not a gecko, either!
I will finish this guy off real quick and get to you next.
His eyes say he is not joking!
I will not let you fight Wendy!
Keep your eyes on the ball, buddy!
With a flaming right hand and a flaming left hand...
If you burn down the west, and burn down the east...
And the heat is so intense...
The power of a dragon and a god are colliding...
You cats are makin' a damn racket!
Oh, it was not just cats?
Looks like a little dragon hunter was in there, too.
It is incredible he can withstand the power of a dragon Wizard the same as Gajeel, just like that...
Is this the power that Lost magic truly holds?
It was the gods who gave man intelligence, who gave man fire.
It was not people or dragons who gave birth to fire.
Rampaging flames that will consume everything in their path...
But even if they have the power to kill a dragon, they cannot kill a god!
This is the magic of Grimoire Heart!
Two little dragon hunters have returned to dust.
How has he been doing this?
Our attacks have not hit even once!
Like he is from a different world...
What in the world could it be?
I do not got time to play with some goat!
He is not using any magic to dodge...
And he does not seem to be able to predict our attacks like Cobra.
I do not know why, but I have felt it from the start...
This feeling like our attacks will not hit!
In front of meh, you are powerless.
There can be no resistance, no opposition.
There is nothing you can do.
Why is it I cannot seem to stand against him?
Man, it is been a while since I felt fire be hot.
Damn it, you are hurt really bad!
Hold on, I will take you to Wendy...
Wait, maybe moving you would be dangerous.
And where am I anyway, damn it?!
This is a battle we will surely...
What are you talking about, Gramps?
Next time, I am totally going to win!
What about the S Class exam?
You are Fairy Tail's Master, right Gramps?
Do not say we cannot win!
Sometimes... retreat... is the only option.
You are no match for him...
Even if I am no match...
Your entire body's breaking out in a cold sweat!
It tells you what your weakness is.
When faced with absolute power, people have no choice but to stop and cower in fear!
It is true this is fear.
But it is a different fear than the one that Gildarts was talking about.
This shaking is me being afraid...
You will Nbe defeated by my hands!
It seems I have drawn the short straw.
What is that supposed to mean?
I believe I said something like First it was cats and children, and now women?
I had hoped to fight a bit tougher opponents...
Perhaps it would be better had I not said anything.
Since you will also be defeated here, by me.
That is why I am not going to hold back!
You can use some interesting magic.
She can chain her Take Overs instantly?
Since when could Lisanna do such high level techniques?
Do not think so little of me!
I am a Fairy Tail wizard too, you know!
You can fight better than I thought.
Then perhaps I will teach you how far apart your level is from mine.
Spirit and attitude alone do not make for me a worthy opponent.
Battles are fought at the risk of one's life.
Do not you think they should stir one's heart?
What is that supposed to mean?
Our differences in power do not matter!
We are all just protecting our home to return to!
But I am afraid that against me...
Lisanna, you go search for everyone else.
This woman, who I have barely sensed any magic power from...
For just a moment I felt an incredible pressure from her.
If we combine our powers, we are sure to win!
You are the same as you were back then...
So I take it there is no need for me to hold back?
You will pay for underestimating the power of our guild... of our family!
That is so funny I am not even laughing.
I told you, that do not hurt!
He can also use fire magic?
There is a difference between the flames of a dragon and the flames of a god!
They are wrath incarnate, destroying all before them!
God's flames love to devour wizards!
Last Supper of the Flame God!
Once you are trapped between these flames, you are finished.
The only thing that escapes is your ashes!
Well, I am going to eat it instead!
Dragons are not strong enough to eat the flames of a god!
Just try hurting this boy any more in front of me!
I will crush you down to the bone!
You got enough strength left in ya?
Because if you do not it is your arm that is going to be gone.
Do not underestimate the power... of family!!
The dragon hunter, Makarov, or maybe me?
I wonder which one's going to kick the bucket first?
And the dragon hunter bites the dust first!
How is he eating the flames of a god?
He emptied his magic power completely for a moment...
And he created a new vessel which let us him eat flames he could not eat before!
I guess there are some flames that take a little trick to eat.
That battle plan is way more than a little trick...
Emptying your magic power while in the middle of your enemy's?
Are you tryin' to kill yourself?!
I have no plan on dying.
I are not going to let anyone die.
We are all going home together.
Join together the flames of a dragon and the flames of a god!
Dazzling Blaze... of the Dragon God!
I am glad you won, but you use magic so recklessly!
Emptying your own magic to suck up your opponent's?
There is no wrong way to use magic, okay?
And anyway, this is me we are talking about.
You would have sounded a lot cooler if you had not added that.
Next time: The World of Great Magic.
You should not brag when you just barely won, anyway.
Better than Mr. I Did not Do a Damn Thing Happy.
